name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with adjustable DPI and long battery life.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and blue switches.

name: USB-C Hub
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and PD charging.

name: Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery.

name: Smart LED Bulb
description: Wi-Fi enabled LED bulb with voice control and color customization.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Water-resistant fitness tracker with heart rate monitor and step counter.

name: Portable SSD 1TB
description: High-speed external SSD with USB 3.2 interface and compact design.

name: 4K Webcam
description: Ultra HD webcam with autofocus, wide-angle lens, and built-in microphone.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable speaker with deep bass, 12-hour playtime, and waterproof design.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand for improved ergonomics and airflow.
